revtext: Hey All, Ayesha being a great human being and doing superb job.I luved the way she suggested us the product and hats off to her patience, product looks really natural..u get lot of confidence.Its really worth visiting the store and having the product.. Thanks Ayesha, keep it. All d best
revreply: We are honoured to receive your comments and thank you for taking the time to do it. As a brand we take pride if our craftsmanship and quality but more than that we are very proud of our team whose dedication and commitment to "make a difference" in people's lives. This is the motto of all of us at every level.Thank you once again for your blessings and best wishes.
